content:
sG plans to overhaul its website sg.uchicago.edu to boost functionality for both students and SG officers according to secondyear Vice President for Administration Forrest Scofield PERIOD

Among the changes are a switch from content manager WordPress to Drupal and a facelift to make the site more pleasing to the eye PERIOD Scofield also hopes to implement different levels of access to allow individual members of College Council and Graduate Council to add content such as blog posts and videos PERIOD We want different forms of content for students to digest Scofield said PERIOD In the past only members of the SG Cabinet have been able to edit the site PERIOD

SG will begin developing these changes in the coming weeks PERIOD Asked why no progress was made on the website during the summer SG President Youssef Kalad said The website wasnt a major priority over the summer I think youll see a better website in the future explaining that his slate mainly used the summer months for planning initiatives and serving out its role as Summer Student Government Finance Committee SGFC PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of University of Chicago PERIOD Your contributions go towards our annual website hosting costs and equipment costs PERIOD
